floors.detection_reasoning: Explicit 'LOWER FLOOR' label and context below 'MAIN FLOOR'.

floor_analysis.notes: Features a patio accessible from the exterior or via stairs from Main floor. Stairs connect to the main floor.

floors.detection_reasoning: Explicit 'MAIN FLOOR' label and central position in layout.

floor_analysis.notes: Includes a two-car garage at a lower level connected by interior stairs. Features an open concept living, eating, and kitchen area.

floors.detection_reasoning: Explicit 'UPPER FLOOR' label and context above 'MAIN FLOOR'.

floor_analysis.notes: Primarily bedrooms and a recreation room. Stairs connect down to the main floor.

overall_analysis.notes: The floor plan presents a three-story house (Lower, Main, Upper) with explicit area and ceiling height information for each floor. The total finished area matches the sum of the floor areas. Scale is consistent across all three sections based on OCR dimensions. The lower floor is likely a walk-out basement given the exterior patio and stairs connecting up. The main floor features a garage and open concept living. The upper floor is primarily dedicated to bedrooms and a recreation space. All dimensions are imperial.
